Dear Shagan,

 

Thank you for the notification.

 

*	We note that these goods were delivered on May 05, 2025 – please share your email notice against AAS and carriers at the time the cargo was received.
*	POD is claused – please obtain the response from the AAS and carriers
*	Provide a detailed claim bill

 

Kindly note that the above communication or requirements are not exhaustive. Issued on “without prejudice” basis.

 

Best Regards,

(م). قبل فتح أي مرفقات، يرجى التحقق منها وفحصها من الفيروسات والعيوب.
